meanings.definition: To attempt to do something again after an initial failure.
meanings.sent1: She retries the puzzle after failing the first time.
meanings.sent2: He always retries his math problems to get them right.
meanings.sent3: The cat retries jumping on the counter but keeps missing.
meanings.sent4: The flower retries blooming after a harsh storm.
meanings.sent5: The student retries reading the paragraph until understanding it.

meanings.definition: The act of trying to do something again after an initial failure.
meanings.sent1: His retries at solving the puzzle paid off in the end.
meanings.sent2: The retries in the game show his determination to win.
meanings.sent3: The cake's retries to rise in the oven were unsuccessful.
meanings.sent4: The plant's retries to grow taller were hindered by lack of sunlight.
meanings.sent5: Her retries in the race showed her perseverance and grit.
